greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-x)/(1-2*x^2-x^3).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,1).
formula: a(n) = A008346(n) - A008346(n-1), n>=1. - _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 19 2013
program: (Sage) [fibonacci(n-2) + 2*(-1)^n for n in (0..50)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 04 2019
(GAP) List([0..50], n-> Fibonacci(n-2) + 2*(-1)^n); # _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 04 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
